primary_key.description: The key that is used to store the item

txs.description: The list of hidden txs by tx_id

auth.ItemKey.description: ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━  Keys─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────Item KeysWhen converted to its string form it will be:- Key := {ITEM_TYPE}{COLLECTION_ID}{...ITEM_ID}Reference KeysUsed to store references to items for case like a user having a roleWhen converted to its string form it will be:{Ref}{REFERENCE_TYPE}{COLLECTION_ID}[{ITEM1_TYPE}{...ITEM1_ID}][{ITEM2_TYPE}{...ITEM2_ID}]SubKeysWhen converted to its string form it will be:{SUB_ITEM_TYPE}{COLLECTION_ID}{ITEM_TYPE}{...ITEM_ID}{SUB_ITEM_ID}Examples- Suggestion := {auth.Suggestion}  {COLLECTION_ID}{ITEM_TYPE}{...ITEM_ID}{SUGGESTION_ID}- HiddenTxList := {auth.HiddenTxList}{COLLECTION_ID}{ITEM_TYPE} {...ITEM_ID}
